data.title: Philippe Chow in Washington DC
data.meta_description: Philippe Chow has a world-renowned chef. Unrivaled cuisine. An atmosphere that draws the “it crowd” night after night. Nationwide Shipping on Goldbelly
data.meta_site_name: Philippe Chow | Upscale Chinese Restaurant in New York City.
data.text:
Hours & Location

635 Wharf St SW,

Washington, DC 20024

Wharf Map

Dress Code

Philippe Chow is your luxury brand to indulge and enjoy. We ask that you appear in fashionable attire to enhance the experience for all our guests. We kindly ask guests to refrain from wearing athletic-wear, hoods, beach attire, flip flops, and torn or excessively revealing clothing.

Philippe Chow management reserves the right to determine if a guest needs to adjust their attire before being seated.

Dinner

Monday - Wednesday: 5pm - 9:30pm

Thursday - Friday: 5pm - 10:30pm

Saturday: 4pm - 10:30pm

Sunday: 4pm - 9:30pm

Happy Hour

Monday - Friday: 5pm - 7pm

Saturday - Sunday: 4pm - 7pm

Contact: 202-601-8888

Join Our TeamContactPrivate Events Inquiry Private Dining Menus and Floorplans

Media InquiriesExplore the NeighborhoodDirections

More About The Wharf

The Wharf reestablished Washington, DC, as a waterfront city and destination. This remarkable, mile-long stretch along the Potomac River comes to life with restaurants, retailers, residences, and businesses—all complemented by monumental views and vibrant culture.
